alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 4:16AM CDT until May 13 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa...Missouri... Mississippi River at Keokuk LD19, Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Bellevue LD12, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, Dubuque LD11, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Dubuque LD11. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday evening and continue falling to 15.5 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.
